title: The Powwow Grimoire
features: The tradition of Powwow has remained an obscure piece of the Pennsylvania German Christian community...until now. Powwow practitioner Robert Phoenix offers the most comprehensive how-to guide on the tradition of Powwow available to date. Complete with all the information required to perform healing charms, create protective talismans, combat witchcraft, make hex signs, create himmelsbriefs, make herbal remedies, use playing cards as a divination tool, make magic mirrors, and more, this is the ultimate guide to learning and practicing the tradition of Pennsylvania German Powwow.
description: Robert Phoenix (formerly Chapman) was born and raised in the culture of the Pennsylvania Germans. He has been studying and practicing the tradition of Powwow for many years, and is a well-known practitioner of the tradition. Robert lives in Southcentral Pennsylvania where he provides Powwowing services to his community and continues to share all that he learns with those who have a sincere interest in learning the tradition.
